role_description: An Ansible role that installs docker-pushrm on most platforms
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs docker-pushrm on most platforms. docker-pushrm is a Docker CLI plugin that adds a new docker pushrm (speak:
) command to Docker. It pushes the README file from the current working directory to a container registry server where it appears as repo description in the webinterface.
